entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -23.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
